channel.title: Custom Dragon platebody and helm legs will come soon
channel.description:
This is my first attempt on these, these will be in me and pooplers project " Little Piece of Heaven" sorry for watermarks Front: [IMG]http://i1251.photobucket.com/albums/hh555/wthsquids/withoutwireframefront_zps2760671d.png[/img]
Back (before i added wrist guards): [IMG]http://i1251.photobucket.com/albums/hh555/wthsquids/NewImage2_zps2def18ed.png[/img]
sidish view?: [IMG]http://i1251.photobucket.com/albums/hh555/wthsquids/sideview_zpsc600037f.png[/img]
Wireframe: [IMG]http://i1251.photobucket.com/albums/hh555/wthsquids/withwireframe_zpsc297c607.png[/img]

item.title: Custom Dragon platebody and helm legs will come soon
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Throw some more detail in there, some symbols, a spike, a variation of face level, you know? It just seems like… the same. Also i think up where your should is there is a problem with your wire frame, either you’ve joined one at the front with the back or the faces under it are showing. If they’re joined might want to fix that, if there is a face under, you don’t need it there.

Read full topic
item.source: Custom Dragon platebody and helm legs will come soon

item.title: Custom Dragon platebody and helm legs will come soon
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

amy_webb:

Add some type of wrist guard that matches the shoulders. Need more variety of colour, like maybe some more white or a darker red for trim. Can you post a wire frame?

is that better i added wrist guards i’ll change color later on

Read full topic
